data.lyric:
[ti:Living]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Living]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Living - Dierks Bentley
[00:12.89]This mornin' I got up at 601
[00:15.90]I walked out and saw the rising sun
[00:18.56]And I drank it in like whiskey
[00:22.75]
[00:24.23]I saw a tree I've seen a thousand times
[00:27.17]A bird on a branch and I watched it fly away in the wind
[00:31.67]
[00:32.90]And it hit me
[00:34.57]
[00:35.79]It's a beautiful world sometimes I don't see so clear
[00:40.05]
[00:40.89]Some days you just breath in
[00:43.19]
[00:43.72]Just try to break even
[00:45.97]
[00:46.79]Sometimes your heart's poundin' out of your chest
[00:49.71]Sometimes it's just beatin'
[00:51.71]
[00:52.58]Some days you just forget
[00:54.43]
[00:55.26]What all you've been given
[00:57.43]
[00:58.78]Some days you just get back
[01:00.98]
[01:01.63]And some days you're just alive
[01:04.13]Some days you're livin'
[01:06.29]
[01:09.89]Some days you're livin'
[01:12.08]
[01:16.75]I went back in and fired the coffee up
[01:19.32]She walked in the kitchen like she always does
[01:22.25]In my T-shirt and it killed me
[01:26.20]
[01:27.97]And I kissed her like it was the first time
[01:30.88]She laughed and looked at me like I'd lost my mind
[01:33.61]I said
[01:33.88]Baby I love you can't live without you I know I don't say it enough
[01:38.58]Some days you just breath in
[01:40.86]
[01:41.62]Just try to break even
[01:43.44]
[01:44.41]Sometimes your heart's poundin' out of your chest
[01:47.49]Sometimes it's just beatin'
[01:49.48]
[01:50.42]Some days you just forget
[01:52.44]
[01:53.34]What all you've been given
[01:55.53]
[01:56.73]Some days you just get back
[01:59.18]And some days you're just alive
[02:01.83]Some days you're livin'
[02:04.06]Like you never die
[02:05.68]Blue's a little bluer up in the sky
[02:08.33]You're high's a little high
[02:10.01]You feel that fire you've been missing
[02:12.62]
[02:13.45]Some days you're living
[02:15.71]
[02:25.77]It'a beautiful world sometimes I don't see so clear
[02:29.94]
[02:30.88]Some days you start singin'
[02:32.81]
[02:33.69]And you don't need a reason
[02:35.78]
[02:36.63]Sometimes the world's just right
[02:38.68]Your clear eyes ain't even blinkin'
[02:42.41]Got a heart full of grateful
[02:44.57]
[02:45.51]For all you've been given
[02:47.72]
[02:48.77]Some days you just get by
[02:51.38]Yeah some days you're just alive
[02:54.02]Some days you're livin'
[02:56.01]
[02:59.74]Some days you're livin'
[03:01.83]
[03:06.62]Livin' like you'll never die
[03:09.32]Blue's a little bluer up in the sky
[03:12.00]You're high's a little high
[03:13.49]You feel that fire you've been missin'
[03:16.58]
[03:17.17]Some days you're living
[03:19.21]
[03:22.83]Some days you're living
data.trans:
[ti:Living]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Living]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:12.89]今天早上 我六点零一分起床
[00:15.90]走到外面 看见朝阳冉冉升起
[00:18.56]我细细观赏这幅美景 仿佛在品尝一杯极品威士忌
[00:22.75]
[00:24.23]我看见了一颗树 这棵树我已见过无数次
[00:27.17]鸟儿立在枝头 树枝随风摇摆
[00:31.67]
[00:32.90]这一幕让我深受触动
[00:34.57]
[00:35.79]这个世界如此美丽 而我有时却难以将她看清
[00:40.05]
[00:40.89]有时候 你活着
[00:43.19]
[00:43.72]只是为了战胜困难
[00:45.97]
[00:46.79]有时候你的心脏仿佛要跳出胸腔
[00:49.71]有时候又只是千篇一律的跳着
[00:51.71]
[00:52.58]有时候你忘了
[00:54.43]
[00:55.26]拥有的那些
[00:57.43]
[00:58.78]有时候 你只是重回原点
[01:00.98]
[01:01.63]有时候 你仅仅是活着
[01:04.13]有时候你却好好生活
[01:06.29]
[01:09.89]有时候你却好好生活
[01:12.08]
[01:16.75]我进屋 煮了咖啡
[01:19.32]她像往常一样 走进厨房
[01:22.25]把手伸进我的衬衫下面 这足以让我缴械投降
[01:26.20]
[01:27.97]我亲吻了她 就像初次那样
[01:30.88]她笑了 看着我 仿佛我已经失去理智
[01:33.61]我说
[01:33.88]宝贝我爱你 没有你我无法生活 你知道 我对你的爱远不止此
[01:38.58]有时候 你活着
[01:40.86]
[01:41.62]只是为了战胜困难
[01:43.44]
[01:44.41]有时候你的心脏仿佛要跳出胸腔
[01:47.49]有时候又只是千篇一律的跳着
[01:49.48]
[01:50.42]有时候你忘了
[01:52.44]
[01:53.34]拥有的那些
[01:55.53]
[01:56.73]有时候 你只是重回原点
[01:59.18]有时候 你仅仅是活着
[02:01.83]有时候你却好好生活
[02:04.06]好像永远不会死去
[02:05.68]天空更蓝了
[02:08.33]你越来越兴奋
[02:10.01]你内心感受到了那团失去的火焰
[02:12.62]
[02:13.45]有时候你却好好生活
[02:15.71]
[02:25.77]这个世界如此美丽 而我有时却难以将她看清
[02:29.94]
[02:30.88]有时候你开始歌唱
[02:32.81]
[02:33.69]不需要理由
[02:35.78]
[02:36.63]有时候这世界一切都好
[02:38.68]你的眼睛甚至眨都不眨
[02:42.41]有一个感恩的心
[02:44.57]
[02:45.51]对于所有拥有的东西
[02:47.72]
[02:48.77]有时候你得过且过
[02:51.38]仅仅是活着
[02:54.02]有时候你却好好生活
[02:56.01]
[02:59.74]有时候你却好好生活
[03:01.83]
[03:06.62]好好生活 就像永远不会死去一样
[03:09.32]天空更蓝了
[03:12.00]你越来越兴奋
[03:13.49]你内心感受到了那团失去的火焰
[03:16.58]
[03:17.17]有时候你要好好生活
[03:19.21]
[03:22.83]有时候你要好好生活
